effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 631,893 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 281,586.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Grasp the shard tightly to enrich yourself with crystalline energy, increasing your Mastery by 5,995 for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: The shard draws in remnant energy from defeated enemies, increasing your Mastery by 126 for 15 sec, up to 5 times.

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 343 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 54,117 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 123,000.

name: Blastfurious Machete
description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.
